answers.text:
Below are links to various documents, programs, studies, etc., that I was able to find that I hope you find useful:
SALEM SUSTAINABLE CITIES INITIATIVE: CIVIC ENGAGEMENT STRATEGIES
http://www.cityofsalem.net/Residents/Sustainable-Salem/SCI/Documents/SCI-Salem-NA-FINAL.pdf
Draft Boston – Community Engagement Strategy 
http://www.cityofboston.gov/Images_Documents/Community%20Engagement%20Strategy%20DRAFT_tcm3-15941.pdf 
Arlington County - PLACE! Check out the website and be sure to watch the video on the far right of the homepage
http://arlingtonplace.us/ 
Greater Dandenon - Community Engagement Strategy
http://www.greaterdandenong.com/Documents.asp?ID=2441&Title=Community+Engagement+Strategy+ 
Ryerson University Background Paper: Civic Engagement and the City of Toronto: Review and Reflection on Current Practices and Future 
Approaches
http://www.toronto.ca/governingtoronto/pdf/robinson.pdf 
Institute for Local Government - Principles of Local Government Public Engagement
http://www.ca-ilg.org/post/principles-local-government-public-engagement 
NHI’s Network Organizing: A Strategy for Building Community Engagement
http://www.nhi.org/online/issues/140/LCW.html 
Community Engagement Strategies – Tip Sheet 
http://socrates.berkeley.edu/~pbd/pdfs/Community_Engagement_Strategies.pdf
Good practice in community engagement from an equality perspective
http://www.equalityhumanrights.com/uploaded_files/good_practice_in_community_engagement.pdf
Ventura, CA – arrow down
http://www.cityofventura.net/cm/civicengagement 
Sustainable Cities Institute – Community Engagement
http://www.sustainablecitiesinstitute.org/view/page.basic/class/tag.topic/community_engagement 
RFP for Scope of Work for Consulting Services for Community Engagement Best Practices Review (May 14, 2012)
http://www.sfcontroller.org/modules/showdocument.aspx?documentid=3210 
Not too sure about this one, but am sending just in case
National League of Cities - Civic Engagement and Recent Immigrant Communities:  A planning guide for local officials and other community leaders
http://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=city%20civic%20engagement%20strategies&source=web&cd=4&ved=0CFoQFjAD&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nlc.org%2FFile%2520Library%2FFind%2520City%2520Solutions%2FResearch%2520Innovation%2FGovernance-Civic%2Fdiscussion-guide-civic-engagement-immigrants-gid-jun10-pdf.pdf&ei=0T_aT4LJLdLy2gXjx4XXBg&usg=AFQjCNHp5c-1fVWe7xysi8oGlJ1GdA4uoA 
Pamela Muse
